attributes.action: cut income tax to at least 5% to leave us with money every month so we can afford to buy instead of the government eating all our wages!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a total disgrace that almost a quarter of our wages are eaten by the goverment...and the government do not do anything to show that our money is being used. We had a pay rise this year???more like a pay drop as tax has gone up! CUT INCOME TAX TO 5% NOW..
